Articles.Content: It occurred to me it would be kinda fun to have a emote option for EVA Kerbals! Getting out of your craft, and doing a little dance on the soul crushing environment of Eve sounds like a good time to me. Being able to right click a kerbal and pick a emote sounds like a safe addition to me!
would be a nice touch if they are going to market the game as 1.0 (which heavily implies a "finished" product to the majority of people).
That could certainly make for better screenshots.
